entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then clearing. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
